name: Death Penalty Alternatives of Arizona
description: Death Penalty Alternatives for Arizona (DPAA) is a non-profit educational organization working to inform the public about the injustices surrounding the death penalty and the criminal punishment system.

name: Worth Rises
description: Worth Rises works to expose the commercialization of the criminal legal system and advocate and organize to protect and return the economic resources extracted from affected communities.

name: Florence Immigrant & Refugee Rights Project
description: For over thirty years, the Florence Project has pursued empowerment and justice for detained immigrants in Arizona.

name: Phoenix Legal Action Network
description: Focused on the things that matter most: Keeping Arizona families together, Challenging (and changing) anti-immigrant narratives, Building community power, Democratizing legal knowledge

name: Salvavision
description: Salvavision is a Tucson, AZ-based non-profit organization that provides aid and support to asylum seekers and those who have been deported.

name: Black Lives Matter Phoenix Metro
description: Black Lives Matter Phoenix Metro is a Black, Queer, and Femme led organization, that centers Black people who are the most impacted and marginalized because we believe ALL BLACK LIVES MATTER. We build solidarities with other colonized folks in the Global South to end imperial rule.

name: African American Christian Clergy Coalition
description: The vision of the AACCC is to promote unity among the clergy of African American descent in the Maricopa County Metropolitan Area in order that our individual lives will be enriched, our diverse churches and ministries will be strengthened, and the unique needs of our community will be addressed.

name: Tucson Jews For Justice
description: To encourage and enable the Jewish Community of Tucson to collaborate and foster social justice within the Tucson progressive community

name: Castillo Law
description: help Arizona families protect what matters most.

name: American Civil Liberties Union - Arizona Chapter
description: The ACLU of Arizona advances equity and dismantles systemic injustice by taking legal action, influencing policy, and mobilizing our communities to protect the civil rights, liberties, and dignity of all Arizonans.
